org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem

类 FsSavepointStreamFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem.FsCheckpointStreamFactory
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem.FsSavepointStreamFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    CheckpointStreamFactory

    public class FsSavepointStreamFactory
extends FsCheckpointStreamFactory
    A CheckpointStreamFactory that produces streams that write to a FileSystem.

    The difference to the parent FsCheckpointStreamFactory is only in the created directory layout. All checkpoint files go to the checkpoint directory.

    • 嵌套类概要
